channel.title: AncientPK! Best Pking Server!
channel.description:
[img]http://ancientpk.net/images/logo.png[/img] The second release of [b]AncientPK[/b]! It's finally here.
[b]A little about AncientPK:[/b] [b]AncientPK[/b] is currently a slowly growing community, focusing mainly on PKing, we strive to bring only the best content to our players to create an enjoyable and balanced game. The Game-Server is hosted on a VPS online 24/7. It has very fast upload and download speed to bring you the game that you wan't to play at lightning fast speeds. Staff is on extremely frequently to monitor the server and interacting with players, our support team does it's very best to help every player in need and provide an enjoyable experience for every player. We feature a complex PvM system including all godwars bosses and even some special bosses that are donator-exclusive. Duel your friends at the duel arena or even stake competitors for high rewards and facing terrible losses, pit against enemies in a huge free for all at the fight pits, or even stake it out in the Duel Arena. Player kill safely in FunPK, or try your luck in the crucible, fight other players in the deep wilderness at mage-bank or just casually PK in edgeville.
[b]Bosses:[/b] Godwars Bosses Corporal Beast King Black Dragon Daggannoth Kings Tormented Demons
[b]Equipment:[/b] Chaotics Vesta, Zuriel, Statius and Morrigans Torva, Pernix, Ancient, etc Third-Age, Bandos, Armadyl Dragon Claws w/ spec God Swords w/ specs Much, much more!
[b]Donator Options:[/b] Your very own donator locations for bosses A relaxing donator lounge Donator specific items Ability to change spell book anywhere Instant Godwars Kills
[b]Why you should play:[/b] We love each and everyone! You need help with something, our staff is there. Someone PK'ed you and you want revenge? We'll help you achieve that.
[b]Links:[/b] Webclient: [url=http://www.ancientpk.net]Click Here![/url] Downloadable Client: [url=http://www.ancientpk.net/downloads/APKv2.rar]Click Here![/url] Vote: [url=http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/vote-27953.html]Click Here![/url]
[b]Media:[/b] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/summoning_zps2d787370.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/summoning_zps2d787370.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/shop_zps33a3dc51.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/shop_zps33a3dc51.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/regular-pray_zpse0d453e5.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/regular-pray_zpse0d453e5.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/home_zps2cd3258b.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/home_zps2cd3258b.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/godwars_zps5c96df7f.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/godwars_zps5c96df7f.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/gameframe_zpscc3e0acf.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/gameframe_zpscc3e0acf.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/client-options_zpsc4a5e767.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/client-options_zpsc4a5e767.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/chaotic_zps0551ed26.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/chaotic_zps0551ed26.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/boss-teleports_zpsfbad7e2a.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/boss-teleports_zpsfbad7e2a.png[/img][/url] [url=http://s1363.photobucket.com/user/Michael_X_Dorsett/media/veng_zps40a23768.png.html][img]http://i1363.photobucket.com/albums/r711/Michael_X_Dorsett/veng_zps40a23768.png[/img][/url]
Here's a PKin' video [size=8pt](creds to [i]Steven[/i])[/size]: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z_WzgvstNr8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z_WzgvstNr8[/url]
[b]In-Game Staff:[/b] Owner: [i]Ancient[/i] Co-Owner: [i]TJ[/i] Admin(s): [i]Nolank0s[/i] Mod(s): [i]Steven[/i]
- Ancient, Owner/Coder

item.title: AncientPK! Best Pking Server!
item.dc:creator: @m4x_pwng3 m4x pwng3
item.description:
@m4x_pwng3 wrote:


The second release of AncientPK! It’s finally here.

A little about AncientPK:
AncientPK is currently a slowly growing community, focusing mainly on PKing, we strive to bring only the best content to our players to create an enjoyable and balanced game. The Game-Server is hosted on a VPS online 24/7. It has very fast upload and download speed to bring you the game that you wan’t to play at lightning fast speeds. Staff is on extremely frequently to monitor the server and interacting with players, our support team does it’s very best to help every player in need and provide an enjoyable experience for every player. We feature a complex PvM system including all godwars bosses and even some special bosses that are donator-exclusive. Duel your friends at the duel arena or even stake competitors for high rewards and facing terrible losses, pit against enemies in a huge free for all at the fight pits, or even stake it out in the Duel Arena. Player kill safely in FunPK, or try your luck in the crucible, fight other players in the deep wilderness at mage-bank or just casually PK in edgeville.

Bosses:
Godwars Bosses
Corporal Beast
King Black Dragon
Daggannoth Kings
Tormented Demons

Equipment:
Chaotics
Vesta, Zuriel, Statius and Morrigans
Torva, Pernix, Ancient, etc
Third-Age, Bandos, Armadyl
Dragon Claws w/ spec
God Swords w/ specs
Much, much more!

Donator Options:
Your very own donator locations for bosses
A relaxing donator lounge
Donator specific items
Ability to change spell book anywhere
Instant Godwars Kills

Why you should play:
We love each and everyone! You need help with something, our staff is there. Someone PK’ed you and you want revenge? We’ll help you achieve that.

Webclient: Click Here!
Downloadable Client: Click Here!
Vote: Click Here!
